  • Method Details

    • getItems

      public JSItem[] getItems(String... itemmasks)
      Returns a list of items based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      itemmasks - A list of item names to include in the result. You can exclude an item by prefixing it with '!' (e.g., "!itemName").
      Returns:
      An array of JSItem objects that match the criteria.

    • getEqualItems

      public JSItem[] getEqualItems(String... itemmasks)
      Returns a list of items with an exact match on the resource name.
      Parameters:
      itemmasks - A list of item names to include in the result. You can exclude an item by prefixing it with '!' (e.g., "!itemName").
      Returns:
      An array of JSItem objects that match the criteria.

    • sortItems

      public static boolean sortItems(JSItem[] items, String type, boolean desc)
      Sorts an array of items based on the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      items - An array of JSItem objects to sort.
      type - The type of sorting: "quality" for quality, "iquality" for internal quality (e.g., water quality in a bucket).
      desc - A flag for sorting order: true for descending, false for ascending.
      Returns:
      true if sorting was successful, false otherwise.

    • drop

      public void drop(haven.Coord c)
      Drops the item currently held at the specified inventory coordinates.
      Parameters:
      c - The coordinates where the item should be dropped.

    • drop

      public void drop(int x, int y)
      Overloaded method for dropping an item using separate x and y coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate.
      y - The y-coordinate.

    • size

      public haven.Coord size()
      Returns the size of the inventory.
      Returns:
      The size of the inventory as a Coord object.

    • freeSlots

      public int freeSlots()
      Returns the number of unoccupied slots in the inventory.
      Returns:
      The number of empty slots available in the inventory.

    • freeSlotsCoords

      public haven.Coord[] freeSlotsCoords()
      Returns an array of coordinates for empty slots in the inventory. Slots are counted from the top-left corner (0,0).
      Returns:
      An array of Coord objects representing empty slots.

    • freeSlotSizeCoord

      public haven.Coord freeSlotSizeCoord(haven.Coord size)
      Returns the coordinates of an empty slot in the inventory that can fit an item of the specified size.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the item in slots (e.g., a 2x2 bucket).
      Returns:
      The coordinates of an empty slot for the item, or null if none are available.

    • isFreeSlot

      public boolean isFreeSlot(haven.Coord slot)
      Checks if the specified slot in the inventory is empty. Slots are counted from the top-left corner (0,0).
      Parameters:
      slot - The coordinates of the slot to check.
      Returns:
      true if the slot is empty; false otherwise.

    • isFreeSlot

      public boolean isFreeSlot(int x, int y)
      Overloaded function to check if a specified slot is free using separate x and y coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the slot.
      y - The y-coordinate of the slot.
      Returns:
      true if the slot is empty; false otherwise.

    • isActual

      public boolean isActual()
      Checks if the inventory exists.
      Returns:
      true if the inventory window exists, false otherwise.
